name: Eurogamer font and size change
description: Replaces the default sans serif font of the Eurogamer site (which is annoying because lowercase i looks like lowercase L) with Tinos (free serif font, optimised for screen reading), and modifies the character size (because Tinos is a bit small)
additional_info: download and install Tinos font (e.g. from here http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/tinos )
